pkgmetadata.longdescription: C3S Quality Control Tools for Historical Climate Data // Quality control and formatting tools developed for the Copernicus Data Rescue Service. The package includes functions to handle the Station Exchange Format (SEF), various statistical tests for climate data at daily and sub-daily resolution, as well as functions to plot the data. For more information and documentation see https://datarescue.climate.copernicus.eu/st_data-quality- control.
